What the Bleep Peep - Bundle Pack - Bone White
kDesc

What the Bleep Peep is bad to the Bone! This naughty little Peep brings three for one with extra Peep fun! Bring your Peep into your apartment and let the fun begin. You can control you Peep with custom animations and moves. Take him outside of your apartment as a Companion or place him on display in your apartment in his Peep-a-Boo box. Collect them all and stack them for all to see!
 This set includes the following items.


・What the Bleep Peep - Bone White
 ・What the Bleep Peep - Static Mini - Bone White
 ・What the Bleep Peep - Heavy Pet - Bone White


※ All of the above items will become available in their relevant categories on purchasing this bundle. [#Legal]

What the Bleep Peep est profondément mauvais! Ce vilain petit Peep ramène trois en un avec Peep fun supplémentaire! Ramène ton Peep à ton appartement et que la fête commence. Tu peux contrôler ton Peep avec des animations et manœuvres personnalisées. Prends le à l'extérieur de ton appartement comme compagnon ou expose le dans ton appartement dans sa boîte Peep-a-Boo. Rassemble les tous et entasse les pour que tous puissent les voir![#Legal]

What the Bleep Peep ist ein ungezogener Begleiter! Dieses freche kleine Peep kommt im Dreier-Pack mit extra Peep-Spaß! Bring dein Peep in deine Wohnung und der Spaß beginnt. Du kannst dein Peep mit benutzerdefinierten Animationen und Bewegungen steuern. Nimm ihn als Gefährten mit nach draußen oder stelle ihn in deiner Wohnung in seiner Peep-a-Boo Kiste aus. Sammle sie alle und stelle sie für Alle zur Schau aus! [#Legal]

What the Bleep Peep é cattivissimo! Questo piccolo tepistello é divertimento extra Peep al tre per uno! Porta il tuo Peep dentro il tuo appartamento e che il divertimento abbia inizio. Puoi controllare il tuo Peep con animazioni e movimenti fatti a posta. Portalo fuori dal tuo appartamento come il tuo Companion oppure mettilo in mostra nel tuo appartamento nella sua scatola Peep-a-Boo. Colleziona tutti quanti e mettili in mostra perché tutti possano vederli![#Legal]

What the Bleep Peep es bien rudo! Este Peep malportado es más diversión Peep al tres por uno! Lleva a tu Peep a tu departamento y que empieze la diversión. Puedes controlar a tu Peep con animaciones y movimientos personalizados. Sácalo de tu departamento como Companion o pónlo de muestra en tu departamento en su propia caja Peep-a-Boo. Colecciónalos todos y amontónalos para que los vea todo el mundo![#Legal]
*Not Localised* Home_Object_68 [#Legal]

What the Bleep Peep은 심술궂은 친구랍니다! 이 건방지고 작은 Peep으로 세 가지 즐거움을 누려보세요! Peep을 아파트로 데려와 신나게 놀아 보세요. 사용자 지정 애니메이션과 모션으로 Peep을 컨트롤할 수 있습니다! 친구처럼 아파트 밖에 데려가거나 Peep-A-Boo 박스에 디스플레이된 Mini-Peep을 아파트에 데려다 놓아보세요. Mini-Peep을 모두 모아 친구들에게 자랑해 보세요!
본 세트에는 하기 아이템이 포함되어 있습니다. 


●What the Bleep Peep - 해골 화이트
 ●What the Bleep Peep - Static Mini - 해골 화이트
 ●What the Bleep Peep - Heavy Pet - 해골 화이트


※ 상기 모든 아이템들은 이 번들 구입과 동시에 적절한 카테고리에서 이용할 수 있습니다. [#Legal]

What the Bleep Peep is bad to the Bone! This naughty little Peep brings three for one with extra Peep fun! Bring your Peep into your apartment and let the fun begin. You can control you Peep with custom animations and moves. Take him outside of your apartment as a Companion or place him on display in your apartment in his Peep-a-Boo box. Collect them all and stack them for all to see!
 This set includes the following items.


・What the Bleep Peep - Bone White
 ・What the Bleep Peep - Static Mini - Bone White
 ・What the Bleep Peep - Heavy Pet - Bone White


※ All of the above items will become available in their relevant categories on purchasing this bundle. [#Legal]

What the Bleep Peep壞透了！這頑皮的 Peep為您帶來特別的Peep樂趣！帶Peep進入您家，開始玩樂。您可以用自訂動態和動作來控制Peep。他可以作為隨身夥伴和您一起外出，或者您可以將他放進專用Peep-A-Boo盒子，成為家居擺設。集齊全套，向朋友炫耀一下吧！
 本組合包含以下商品。


●What the Bleep Peep - 枯骨白
 ●What the Bleep Peep 靜態迷你公仔 - 枯骨白
 ●What the Bleep Peep - Heavy Pet - 枯骨白


※ 購買組合包後，以上所有物品都會加入相關的類別中。[#Legal]
